name: createDateTime
syntax: createDateTime(year, month, day, hour, minute, second)

params.name: year
params.description: Integer in the range 0-9999. When in the range 0-29, year is converted to 2000-2029. When in the range 30-99, year is converted to 1930-1999. You cannot specify dates before AD 100.

params.name: month
params.description: Numeric month of the year (1-12). CF2016+ Optional

params.name: day
params.description: Day of the month. CF2016+ Optional

params.name: hour
params.description: Hour of the day in 24-hour notation (0-23). CF2016+ Optional

params.name: minute
params.description: Minute within the hour. CF2016+ Optional

params.name: second
params.description: Second within the minute. CF2016+ Optional
